com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.server

Class LocateRMIRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.server.LocateRMIRegistry

  • public class LocateRMIRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    The class only contains one method, which returns the RMI Registry Client for a given endpoint if valid.
    Author:
    Jimmy Zong

    • Method Detail

      • getRegistry

        public static RMIRegistryClient getRegistry(java.lang.String hostName,
                            int port)
        Given hostname and port, detects if the endpoint is a RMI Registry. If so, return the corresponding RMI Registry Client object; otherwise return null.
        Parameters:
        hostName - Host name for the remote endpoint
        port - Port number for the remote endpoint
        Returns:
        RMI Registry Client object if endpoint is valid; otherwise null
